verses.roman:
nityānande kahe prabhu,--deha mora daṇḍa
nityānanda bale,--daṇḍa haila tina khaṇḍa

synonyms: nityānande—to Lord Nityānanda; kahe—asks; prabhu—Lord Caitanya; deha—give; mora—My; daṇḍa—sannyāsa staff; nityānanda bale—Śrī Nityānanda replies; daṇḍa—Your sannyāsa staff; haila—became; tina khaṇḍa—divided into three parts.
translation: When Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu had thus regained external consciousness, He asked Lord Nityānanda Prabhu, "Please return My staff." Nityānanda Prabhu then replied, "It has been broken into three parts."
